title: Dance Classics Complete Collection PAL DVDR ReD
description:
. RELEASE INFORMATION .                                              
                                                                          
   Release Date.............: 14-Jun-2008                                 
   Video Type...............: PAL                                         
   Audio Type...............: DD5.1                                       
   Audio Bitrate............: 448kbps                                     
   Runtime..................: 17 hrs 55 min                               
   Menu.....................: Yes                                         
   Subs.....................: English (Showing Song Info)                 
                                                                          
                                                                          
   . BACKGROUND INFORMATION .                                           
                                                                          
   This DVD contains the complete collection of the successful original   
   Dance Classics series, released by Arcade in the period 1988 to 1990.  
   The 16 CDÃƒÂ¢??s in this set have been remastered to Dolby Digital 5.1,     
   resulting in a high quality audio DVD with over 17 hours of music      
   that will make you want to move your feet.
